title: Career Day 2025: Students Meet Tech Professionals
author: Mr. Joseph
excerpt: Local developers, sysadmins, and data scientists visited to share their journeys. Students got real-world advice and inspiration for their futures.

title: Annual Tech Innovation Fair a Great Success!
author: Ms. Amina
excerpt: Our students showcased amazing projects — from AI chatbots to smart home devices. Judges were impressed by the creativity and technical skill on display.
